# KissFFT
This directory should contain the KissFFT header-only library.

## Files Needed
- `kiss_fft.h`
- `kiss_fft.c`
- `_kiss_fft_guts.h`

## Setup
Run the setup script:
```powershell
.\scripts\setup_dependencies.ps1
```

## Manual Download
Download from: https://github.com/mborgerding/kissfft

```bash
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mborgerding/kissfft/master/kiss_fft.h
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mborgerding/kissfft/master/kiss_fft.c
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mborgerding/kissfft/master/_kiss_fft_guts.h
```
